posts.post_content:
Currently kind of underrated, reminds me of [Thought Courier](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thought Courier), although they actually have two completely different abilities.  
I'm glad Wizard [noticed the greenishness](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=122374) of this card as well.  
  
Hard to tell whether that's the case, but apparently on the artwork he's currently holding himself on the [Ruhk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=965) Bird.  
Now i think about it, there are apparently a bunch of Arabian Nights cards related to his tale, e.g. [Old Man of the Sea](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Old Man of the Sea).
posts.html:

Now i think about it, there are apparently a bunch of Arabian Nights cards related to his tale, e.g. Old Man of the Sea.
